survey_name: Patient Experience with AI-Powered Symptom Checkers Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather patient feedback on the usability, accuracy, and overall experience with AI-powered symptom checker tools used in healthcare settings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered symptom checker tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout. Ensure the options cover the full spectrum of usage frequency.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered symptom checker tools?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most useful in AI-powered symptom checkers? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox layout. Ensure the options are clear and cover common features.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you find most useful in AI-powered symptom checkers? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of AI-powered symptom checker tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of AI-powered symptom checker tools?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered symptom checker tools?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field. Encourage detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered symptom checker tools?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend AI-powered symptom checker tools to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button layout. Keep the options simple and clear.

script.question_text: Would you recommend AI-powered symptom checker tools to others?
